title: Soil and water: a living world
creator_credit: Barr Films, Sandler Institutional Films, Greg Logan and Greg Johnson
brief_description: Four children are guided on a scientific adventure looking at the living world of soil and water. Explains how topsoil and water are full of plant and animal life called organisms. Indicates types of activities that can be carried out with these two common natural substances.
